name: Icebane Bracers

Icebane BracersLevel 60

Craftsman Wilhelm at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 4 Frozen Runes, 12 Thorium Bars, 2 Arcanite Bars, 2 Essence of Water and 200 gold.

- Thorium Bar x 12
- Arcanite Bar x 2
